bibl.title: Letter about pentarouroi machimoi (and Another Ptolemaic Text).
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: These papyri were studied as part of the International Seminar on the Cairo Papyri. - P. Cair. Inv. 10282. Letter about pentarouroi machimoi. Gurob?, 25 July - 23 August 233 BCE. - Inv. 51605. Fragment of a letter or of a symbolon. Provenance unknown, (mid?) III century BCE? - Pp. 25-26: Attestations of pentarouroi. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Nicola Reggiani, Letter about pentarouroi machimoi (and Another Ptolemaic Text).

These papyri were studied as part of the International Seminar on the Cairo Papyri. - P. Cair. Inv. 10282. Letter about pentarouroi machimoi. Gurob?, 25 July - 23 August 233 BCE. - Inv. 51605. Fragment of a letter or of a symbolon. Provenance unknown, (mid?) III century BCE? - Pp. 25-26: Attestations of pentarouroi. - Avec résumé en anglais.
